course_description: Music majors only. Students will acquire proficiency to play major/minor scales and arpeggios, chord progressions, melodies, and simple keyboard pieces. Piano students are exempt from this required course. Students must either exempt from or be registered for MUS 120 by the time they begin MUS 121.
